Evelyn Hope Squire Merrick (1878 ruo afọ 1936) bụ onye Britain na-ede egwu, onye na-akpọ piano, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke kwadoro ikike ụmụ nwanyị, iri akwụkwọ nri, Esperanto, na egwu ọhụrụ. Ọ megidere England itinye aka na Agha Ụwa Mbụ
O bipụtara ma rụọ ọrụ n'okpuru aha Hope Squire na Hope Merrick
A mụrụ Squire na Southport n'aka injinia na onye na-ede uri John Barret Squire na nwunye ya. Ọ lụrụ onye na-ede egwu Frank Merrick n'afọ 1911.
Squire mụụrụ piano na Henry Gadsby, Tobias Matthay, na Ernst von Dohnanyi
Ọ kụziri piano ma mee ihe ngosi na London Steinway Hall na ebe ndị ọzọ. Ya na Merrick jikọrọ aka nye egwu egwu maka piano abụọ
Mgbe ụfọdụ, ha na-akpọ egwu ọhụrụ n'agwaghị ndị na-ege ntị aha onye dere ya
N'otu n'ime ihe ngosi ndị a n'afọ 1915, ha mere otu egwu abụọ nke Claude Debussy Tian La Mer.
